env.CLAUDE_INSTRUCTIONS: Her zaman Türkçe yanıt ver. Hafıza dolduktan sonra da Türkçe konuşmaya devam et.

allow: Bash(for file in faiz_hesaplama.html harc_hesaplama.html isci_alacagi_hesaplama.html vekalet_hesaplama.html)

Bash(do sed -i 's/background:\s*white/background: var(--card-bg, white)/g; s/background:\s*#ffffff/background: var(--card-bg, #ffffff)/g; s/background:\s*#fff[^0-9a-f]/background: var(--card-bg, #fff)\1/g; s/background-color:\s*white/background-color: var(--card-bg, white)/g; s/background-color:\s*#ffffff/background-color: var(--card-bg, #ffffff)/g' "$file")

Bash(do sed -i 's/background:\s*white/background: var(--card-bg, white)/g; s/background:\s*#ffffff/background: var(--card-bg, #ffffff)/g; s/background-color:\s*white/background-color: var(--card-bg, white)/g; s/background-color:\s*#ffffff/background-color: var(--card-bg, #ffffff)/g; s/background:\s*#f8f9fa/background: var(--background-secondary, #f8f9fa)/g; s/background-color:\s*#f8f9fa/background-color: var(--background-secondary, #f8f9fa)/g' "$file")
